title: Purist: Vanilla Bean Shake
directions: In blender combine ice cream and half-and-half. With knife tip, scrape vanilla bean seeds into blender. Blend until smooth. Divide among four glasses; top with meringue cookies, if desired. Makes 4 (1 1/4 cup) servings.

Servings Per Recipe 4, cal. (kcal) 409, Fat, total (g) 23, chol. (mg) 86, sat. fat (g) 14, carb. (g) 44, Monosaturated fat (g) 6, Polyunsaturated fat (g) 1, fiber (g) 2, sugar (g) 38, pro.
